title: Room 1208
description: Previously published edition of ASIN: B00F6O1W34Maggie’s life hasn’t been an easy one. But in the last two years she’s made giant strides towards overcoming the repercussions of a devastating childhood. Now thirty years old, she’s ready to jump the final hurdle that stands between her past and a new life free from low self-esteem and old hurts. Taking that leap requires the cooperation of a handsome gentleman she spies across a busy airport hotel lounge. Neither one of them foresees the depth of passion shared on that magical night, a passion that is astonishing and profound. One night is all that Maggie expects, all that she’s planned on. But you know what they say about the best-laid plans…[This book is intended for mature audiences]
author: Sophia Renny
